description:
Telecom companies are expected to increase their spending on AI for automating network management to $20 billion by 2028, a new report from Juniper Research found. This would represent a 240 percent rise from estimated spending levels in 2024 of $6 billion. The researchers predict the investment growth will be necessary as telcos expand 5G... Read more »

The post Telcos to spend $20B on AI network orchestration by 2028 appeared first on AI News.
title: Telcos to spend $20B on AI network orchestration by 2028
